user_story: As a customer, I want to be able to view the nutritional information and allergen information for each menu item so that I can make informed choices.
generated_ac:
1. The system shall display the nutritional information for a selected menu item.
2. The system shall display the allergen information for a selected menu item.
3. The system shall enable customers to access the nutritional and allergen information for every menu item.
4. The system shall present the nutritional and allergen information in a clear and distinct manner for customer comprehension.
edited_ac:
1. The system shall display the nutritional information for a selected menu item.
2. The system shall display the allergen information for a selected menu item.
3. The system shall enable customers to access the nutritional and allergen information for every menu item.
4. The system shall present the nutritional and allergen information in a clear and distinct manner for customer comprehension.
